# This file is autogenerated
title: useAuthSession
description: Overview of the useAuthSession method
slug: wallets/reference/alchemy/react/hooks/useAuthSession
---

React hook that returns the current authentication session.

**Advanced usage only.** For most use cases, use higher-level hooks instead.
If you just need user info, use `useUser()` instead.

## Import

```ts
import { useAuthSession } from "@alchemy/react";
```

## Parameters

### parameters

`UseAuthSessionParameters`

- Configuration options for the hook

### parameters.config

`Config`

- Optional wagmi config override

## Returns

`AuthSession | null`
The current auth session, or null if not authenticated
